experience.title: Software Engineer Intern - Cloud Platform
info: Developed and deployed a reverse proxy API request routing pipeline
Achieved substantial reductions in latency, network hops, and resource costs, to optimize system performance
Evaluated network security risks and mitigation strategies, including certificates, tokens, and SSL/TLS protocol
Fine-tuned a large language model (LLM) to resolve customer bug tickets, along with a full-stack UI

experience.company: Penn Center for Neuroengineering and Therapeutics
experience.title: Machine Learning Undergraduate Researcher
info: Trained an NLP model to predict epilepsy patient diagnoses from discharge summaries
Explored strategies for data augmentation and hyperparameter tuning
Achieved up to 87.06% accuracy and applied predictions to over 2600 medical notes
Analyzed and visualized correlation of medication dosage and other variables with successful seizure induction, using a pharmacokinetic absorption model

experience.title: Genomic Data Undergraduate Researcher
info: Identified genotype features characteristic of Alzheimer's disease
Applied open-source computational and bioinformatics tools to analyze extremely large genomic datasets
Performed colocalization studies to evaluate expression levels of genes linked to Alzheimer's disease
